ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] hi
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree about the necro probably winning, however, keep your pet on him and he will have some difficulty casting spells.  This will leave you open to
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree about the necro probably winning, however, keep your pet on
him and he will have some difficulty casting spells. This will leave you
open to his pet and necro pets are down right mean.

You are going to have to root his pet and nuke the snot out of him while
your pet beats on him to keep interrupting his spells. Not sure which pet I
would choose for the fight, definitely not the earth pet though. You need a
nuker or stomper pet for this fight.

If you guys don't use pets, it is probably going to be the necro who wins
due to the DoT and lifetap spells in his arsenal. He will
damageyou/healhimself, that is what necros do....

Good Luck and let us know how it comes out!

Trej
